subject: [sugar] Getting sugar running on a Mac
body:
Hi all!

I'm having a devlish of a time getting anything running with the  
current build instructions.  I've downloaded the live CD images, gone  
through several wiki how-to pages, nothing seems current nor working.

I've tried Q (Qemu) and parallels.  385 just crashes the parallels VM  
and the live images are "not bootable" according to Q.

I've got Unbuntu Edgy installed, but i wanted something closer to the  
real hardware.  I suppose I will go about getting sugar running in  
Ubuntu now.

Any clue as to what is the best way to get a image up for developing?
_______________________________________________
Sugar mailing list
Sugar@laptop.org
http://mailman.laptop.org/mailman/listinfo/sugar
